mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room ( room_id, host_user_email, title, content, gender, max_participants, status, categoryId, start_date, exam_date, deadline, ended_at, hostUserNickname, created_at ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{hostUserEmail}, #{title}, #{content}, #{gender}, #{maxParticipants}, 'OPEN', #{categoryId}, #{startDate}, #{examDate}, #{deadline}, #{endDate}, #{hostUserNickname}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT room_id AS roomId, host_user_email AS hostUserEmail, hostUserNickname, title, content, gender, max_participants AS maxParticipants, status, categoryId, start_date AS startDate, ended_at AS endDate, exam_date AS examDate, deadline, created_at AS createdAt FROM room ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT room_id AS roomId, host_user_email AS hostUserEmail, hostUserNickname, title, content, gender, max_participants AS maxParticipants, status, categoryId, start_date AS startDate, ended_at AS endDate, exam_date AS examDate, deadline, created_at AS createdAt FROM room WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
